mapper.select: select CAST(orders.order_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS order_date, CAST(members.join_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS join_date, orders.*, apply.name, members.*, book.*, section.* from orders join members on members.id = orders.member_id join apply on apply.application_seq = orders.application_seq join book on orders.order_seq = book.order_seq join section on section.section_seq = book.section_seq WHERE ORDERS.DELIVERY_STATUS = 'not shipped'
